io.netty.channel

Class ChannelOption<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.util.UniqueName
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelOption<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the value which is valid for the ChannelOption
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<UniqueName>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EpollChannelOption, RxtxChannelOption, SctpChannelOption, UdtChannelOption

    public class ChannelOption<T>
extends UniqueName
    A ChannelOptionÂ allows to configure a ChannelConfig in a type-safe way. Which ChannelOption is supported depends on the actual implementation of ChannelConfig and may depend on the nature of the transport it belongs to.

      static ChannelOption<Boolean> AUTO_CLOSE
      Deprecated. 
      From version 5.0, Channel will not be closed on write failure. true if and only if the Channel is closed automatically and immediately on write failure. The default is false.

      • AUTO_CLOSE

        @Deprecated
public static final ChannelOption<Boolean> AUTO_CLOSE
        Deprecated. From version 5.0, Channel will not be closed on write failure. true if and only if the Channel is closed automatically and immediately on write failure. The default is false.
